plot: A short documentary following former drug addict Mohammad Husseini as he takes part in a highly controversial form of mourning during the Islamic religious day called Ashura, in Kabul, Afghanistan.
title: Ashura
plot_es: A short documentary following former drug addict Mohammad Husseini as he takes part in a highly controversial form of mourning during the Islamic religious day called Ashura, in Kabul, Afghanistan.
